name: Verify search product request (negative flow - unavailable item)

testSteps.description: 1: Verify search product request (negative flow - unavailable item) ({productName=car})

children.description: Given user perform search request for car

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Connection: keep-alive
Date: Thu, 27 Jan 2022 09:45:14 GMT
Server: uvicorn
Content-Length: 105
Content-Type: application/json
Via: 1.1 vegur

children.description: Then user should get 404 response code

And user should get ERROR with data:
| error | message | requested_item | served_by |
| true | Not found | car | https://waarkoop.com |
